Name: Poker Face
Description: In 2 turns, set your health to its current value. NL Exhaust.

Name: Lucky Seven
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the 7th card you've played this turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

Name: Roll Blue
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Blue_Die.

Name: Lucky Nine
Description: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. If this is the 9th card you've played this turn, gain 9 Strength. NL Exhaust.

Name: Blazing Tactics
Description: Gain [E] . NL coinforged:Chip 1: draw !M! cards.

Name: Cracked Chip
Description: Unplayable. NL coinforged:Poker_Chip. NL When this is spent, Exhaust it.

Name: Pocket Pair
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Green_Dice. NL Exhaust.

Name: Cheater's Luck
Description: Duplicate a random card in your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Name: Game Changer
Description: Each enemy takes damage equal to its intent to attack. NL Exhaust.

Name: Go For Broke
Description: Whenever you play a card, apply 1 coinforged:Crippling_Debt to ALL enemies.

Name: Chip Shuffle
Description: Shuffle all coinforged:Poker_Chips in your hand into your draw pile. Draw a card for each one shuffled.

Name: Stacked Deck
Description: At the end of your turn, set the cost of a random card in your draw pile to 0 until played.

Name: Underdog
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL  If your HP is lower than the enemy's, this deals triple damage.

Name: Defend
Description: Gain !B! Block.

Name: Outrage
Description: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL coinforged:Chip 1: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemeis.

Name: Loaded Dice
Description: Increase *Dice effectiveness by !M!.

Name: Blue Chip
Description: coinforged:Poker_Chip. NL Gain !B! Block.

Name: Melon
Description: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! coinforged:Drawback to EVERYONE.

Name: Trickster's Mark
Description: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy.

Name: Upswing
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Blue_Die.

Name: Down Payment
Description: Innate. NL Apply !M! coinforged:Crippling_Debt. NL Exhaust.

Name: Gray Chip
Description: coinforged:Poker_Chip. Unplayable. NL When this is spent, gain [E] . NL Ethereal.

Name: All In
Description: coinforged:Chip X: Enemey loses X Strength. NL Exhaust.

Name: Attack
Description: Put a random Attack from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

Name: High Roller
Description: Whenever you play a *Six, draw a card.

Name: Grapes
Description: Ethereal. NL Increase a card's Block and damage by !M! this combat. Add a copy of this card into your hand that costs 1 more. NL Exhaust.

Name: Card Cascade
Description: Whenever you draw a card this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Draw a card.

Name: Roll Red
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Red_Dice.

Name: Cash Advance
Description: Draw !M! Cards. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

Name: Lucky Eight
Description: Gain !B! Block. NL If this is the 8th card you've played this turn, gain 8 Thorns.

Name: Orange Chip
Description: coinforged:Poker_Chip. NL Increase your max hand size by 1. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Name: Maxed Out
Description: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

Name: Red Chip
Description: coinforged:Poker_Chip. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Name: Unleashed Strategy
Description: Increase your max hand size by !M!. Draw !M! cards. Gain [E]  for every 3 cards in hand. NL Exhaust.

Name: High Card
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time this card is played, increase its damage by !M! this combat.

Name: Orange
Description: Deal !D! damage twice. Doesn't consume coinforged:Drawback.

Name: Green Chip
Description: coinforged:Poker_Chip. NL Unplayable. NL Retain.

Name: Invigorating Riffle
Description: Whenever a Skill is Exhausted, gain !M! Vigor.

Name: Jackpot
Description: Retain. NL If this is the only card in your hand, draw !M! cards and gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

Name: White Chip
Description: coinforged:Poker_Chip. NL Unplayable.

Name: Buy In
Description: Add !M! *Green *Chips into your hand. NL Gain [E]  for each coinforged:Poker_Chip in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Name: Fate's Hand
Description: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2. NL If the discarded cards had the same cost, gain !M! Strength.

Name: Chaos Form
Description: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, roll a *Chaos *Die.

Name: Stash
Description: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a coinforged:randomized coinforged:Poker_Chip into your hand.

Name: Glass Shield

Name: Red King
Description: coinforged:Red_Dice now damage ALL enemies. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Red_Dice.

Name: Cherry
Description: Deal damage equal to !M! times your cards in hand.

Name: Final Bet
Description: Exhaust all coinforged:Poker_Chips in your hand. Deal !D! damage for each one exhausted. NL Exhaust.

Name: Lucky Break
Description: Draw 2 Cards. NL If they have the same cost, gain !M! Dexterity.

Name: Risky Investment
Description: Lose 10 Gold. NL If you win next turn, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

Name: Bag of Chips
Description: Discard any number of cards then add that many random coinforged:Poker_Chips into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Name: Coin Barrage
Description: Deal !D! damage 11 times. NL Reduce your max hand size by !M!.

Name: Snake Eyes
Description: *Die Rolls are 1 for 2 turns. NL Gain 1 *Buffer. NL Ethereal.

Name: Gain Advantage
Description: Gain !M! coinforged:Advantage.

Name: Long Game
Description: Doesn't shuffle into your deck at the start of combat. Added into hand on turn !M!. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.

Name: Luck of the Draw
Description: Whenever you draw a card, gain !M! Block.

Name: Fold
Description: Gain !M! Block for each card played this turn. NL End your turn.

Name: Wave of Greed
Description: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! gold for each enemy hit. NL Exhaust.

Name: Power
Description: Put a random Power from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

Name: Strategist's Shield
Description: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Strength for each Power in hand.

Name: Cripple

Description: Cards in your draw and discard pile cost 0 until played this turn. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust

Name: Prismatic Roll
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Red_Die. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Blue_Die. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Green_Die. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Purple_Die. NL Exhaust.

Name: Anticipate
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Purple_Die. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

Name: Small Blind
Description: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! Gold.

Name: Double-Dealing
Description: Choose 2 cards. NL Swap their cost this combat. NL Exhaust.

Name: Bluff
Description: Deal !D! damage. If you have !M! debuffs, gain !B! Block.

Name: Drunken Strike
Description: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Whenever you draw this, randomize its cost.

Name: Frenzy
Description: coinforged:Chip !M!: This turn, your next card is played twice.

Name: Black Chip
Description: coinforged:Poker_Chip. NL Unplayable. NL Counts as !M! coinforged:Poker_Chips. Always spent first.

Name: Heart Of The Cards
Description: Draw X cards and set their cost to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Name: Deadly Wager
Description: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. At the start of your turn, lose 2 HP

Description: Discard your hand. Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Purge.

Name: Joker Trick
Description: Choose a card type. NL Put a random card of that type from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs !M! less this turn. NL Exhaust

Description: Deal !D! damage. NL coinforged:Chip 1: Gain !B! Block.

Name: Strike
Description: Deal !D! damage.

Name: Sly Shot
Description: Deal !D! damage to the highest health enemy !M! times.

Name: Blitz
Description: You cannot draw additional cards this turn. Whenever you attack this turn, gain [E].

Name: Coin Flick
Description: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! coinforged:Drawback. Shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Name: Reevaluate
Description: Discard a card. Gain Block equal to its damage. NL Exhaust.

Name: Card Shark
Description: Deal !D! damage. If this is the leftmost card in your hand, it costs 0.

Name: Broken Bottle
